source:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Grawley needs estimates and he needs them now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
アミティーのグラーリーは、冒険者の手を借りたいようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_TODO_00<tab>Request supply estimates from the villagers.
target: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_TODO_00<tab>村人たちに物資の残りを聞く

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_000<tab>Listen, friend, I'm run off my feet here. I need someone to take stock of our remaining food stores, and you just volunteered.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_000<tab>あんた、悪いが、少し手を貸しちゃくれないか？
村の物資の在庫を確認しているんだが、
人手が足りないんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_002<tab>Nigh everything this village needs to survive is hauled up from the lowlands, and if matters don't settle down soon... Well, I won't be surprised when Wright and Stilltide begin hoarding goods instead of selling 'em. Not unless it's for an outrageous price.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_002<tab>この村では、生活必需品を低地側……
ライト村やスティルタイドから仕入れているんだが……
今後の情勢如何では、取引の物価も上がっちまうかもしれない。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_003<tab>Anyway, that's enough speculation. I need estimates─accurate estimates, mind you─from them what's in charge of our edibles. Grains, grog, and meats. Off you hop.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_003<tab>そこで、現在の備蓄量を正確に把握しておきたいんだ。
穀物、飲料、肉類を管理している村人たちに、
在庫状況を聞いてきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_005<tab>Grains, grog, and meats. Speak to the villagers and find out what we've got left...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_005<tab>穀物、飲料、肉類を管理している村人たちに、
在庫状況を聞いてきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAIN03543_000_010<tab>Grawley wants an estimate? Well you can tell him, “Not bloody much.” We'll need to think of something 'cause we're runnin' low on both grain <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> beans...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAIN03543_000_010<tab>物資の残り？
穀物も豆も、そろそろ無くなりそうだよ。
何か対策を練らないといけないな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAIN03543_000_011<tab>Grawley wants an estimate? Well you can tell him, “Not bloody much.” We'll need to think of something 'cause we're runnin' low on both grain <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> beans...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAIN03543_000_011<tab>物資の残り？
穀物も豆も、そろそろ無くなりそうだよ。
何か対策を練らないといけないな……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_ZUMIESHAI_000_012<tab><sigh> We've put a good dent in the liquor we got from the dwarves, so we might have to make do with water at some point. At least we've a fresh source with the river nearby.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_ZUMIESHAI_000_012<tab>ドワーフから仕入れた酒類は少なくなっていますが、
近くに水源があるので、最悪、真水でしのぐつもりですよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_ZUMIESHAI_000_013<tab><sigh> We've put a good dent in the liquor we got from the dwarves, so we might have to make do with water at some point. At least we've a fresh source with the river nearby.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_ZUMIESHAI_000_013<tab>ドワーフから仕入れた酒類は少なくなっていますが、
近くに水源があるので、最悪、真水でしのぐつもりですよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_WALMET_000_014<tab>Hmmm. I'd say we have more than enough dried meat to go around. There was peril in the hunt, but the haul was plentiful.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_WALMET_000_014<tab>ふむ……干し肉には少し余裕がありますよ。
危険は伴いましたが、狩猟に成功しましたから。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_WALMET_000_015<tab>Hmmm. I'd say we have more than enough dried meat to go around. There was peril in the hunt, but the haul was plentiful.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_WALMET_000_015<tab>そうですね……干し肉には少し余裕がありますよ。
危険は伴いましたが、狩猟に成功しましたから。
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_020<tab>どうだ、皆から在庫の状況は聞けたか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_021<tab>...Grain is a problem, then. I'll see if we can't trade our surplus meat in Wright for a few sacks of barley and the like.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_021<tab>……なるほど、状況はわかった。
余剰のある干し肉をライト村などに持ち込んで、
穀物と交換してもらうようにするか……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_022<tab>That will get us through for the moment, but we'll need to come up with a long-term plan...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_022<tab>だが、それじゃあ一時しのぎでしかねえな。
根本的な解決のために、別の手を考えねえと……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_024<tab>...Well, I'll think of something. Thanks for doing the legwork, friend! Say, have you ever considered taking up work as a quartermaster...?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI007_03543_GRAWLEY_000_024<tab>さてと、あんたのおかげで、当面の方針がまとまりそうだ。
面倒なことを頼んじまって悪かった。
手伝ってくれて助かったぜ！
